abstract: At least seven people are wounded in western Ukraine during gun battle between police officers and members of paramilitary group Right Sector.
lead_paragraph: A violent standoff between police officers and a right-wing paramilitary group unsettled a usually peaceful region.

headline.main: Police in Western Ukraine Clash With Paramilitary Group; 7 Are Hurt
headline.print_headline: Police in Western Ukraine Clash With Paramilitary Group; 7 Are Hurt

snippet: A violent standoff between police officers and a right-wing paramilitary group unsettled a usually peaceful region.
